it.uniroma1.lcl.tweetpro

Class JsonParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.lcl.tweetpro.JsonParser

  • public class JsonParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Object to parse a text file representing a tweet corpus. A tweet corpus file has this characteristics:
    • Every line is a tweet;
    • The line format is standard Twitter JSON, without line breaks.
    Author:
    Davide Quaranta

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public Pair<java.util.List<Tweet>,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,User>> parse()
        Parses the document. For each non-empty line:
        1. Initializes the builders for tweet and an eventual retweet;
        2. Extracts the text of the tweet;
          If it is a retweet, extracts its text too;
        3. Cleans the line by removing the characters "[]{};
        4. Splits on commas in a new list;
        5. Calls parseTweet() on the splitted list.
        Returns:
        a list of tweets and a map of users
